title: Contentious Veterans: China’s Retired Officers Speak Out
description: Colin Smith, Editorial Assistant at Armed Forces & Society, interviews Dr. Neil J. Diamant about his article with co-author Dr. Kevin J. O'Brien titled "Contentious Veterans: China’s Retired Officers Speak Out.
